name: Light and Darknes's
description:
Game Cahaya dalam Kegelapan

 Game Jam Dedi R  X Angga S ( Sekolah Tinggi Teknologi Bandung)

Untuk memainkannya wajib menggunakan Laptop/PC (Dikarenakan mekanisme control Keyboard)

Controling System

#Manual Book :

D : Fire Right

A : Fire left

KeyBoard Arrow (Right,Left) : Walking Control

KeyBoard Arrow Top : Jump

Announcment :

Jumping Bottom Area : Player Dead

Game Over :

Left Area : Main Menu

Top Area : Try Again

Main Menu :

Go to Left/Right Area to Play Game

Thank you.... ( @ Dedi Rosadi )
